translations.translation: and left the later people saying of him:
And left (his hallowed memory) for posterity.
and We preserved for him a good name among posterity.
and perpetuated his praise in later generations.
And We kept his praise among the latter generations.
And We left for him among the later generations.
And We perpetuated (praise) to him among the later generations.
and left for him among the later folk
And We left for him among the later folk (the salutation):
and left him thus to be succeeded by a group [of followers] among later generations:
And We left for him among the posterity:
and left for him a good name in posterity:
And We left (this blessing) for him among generations (to come) in later times:
And We left for him (a goodly remembrance) among generations (to come) in later times.
and We let it (the beautiful praise) remain upon him in the latter (generations),
And We left with him for later generations.
And We left for him [favorable mention] among later generations:
[37:108] And We left, We preserved, for him among posterity, fair praise [namely]:
(And We left for him among the later folk (the salutation)) We left Abraham with good praise among the people who came after him:

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ فِي ٱلآخِرِينَ } معناه الثَّناءُ الحَسنُ

translations.translation: And His saying, "We will leave him in the latter," means the praise is good.
